title: Add support for BlendedInfixSuggester in Solr
description: It would be nice to add support for the new BlendedInfixSuggester in Lucene to Solr. The new suggester is similar to AnalyzingInfixSuggester but enables changing the weight of suggesters at query-time depending on the position of the first matching word.

comments.author: Areek Zillur
comments.content:
Initial patch:

	added support for BlendedInfixSuggester in Solr
	added tests
	clean up resources (suggester index) after testing
